text: Goran Sankovič (18 June 1979 – 4 June 2022) was a Slovenian professional footballer. He played as a defender for Slovenian team Celje, Czech team Slavia Prague, and Greek teams Akratitos and Panionios. He played for the Slovenia national football team from 2001 until 2002. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Slovenian footballers
title: Goran Sankovič
